document.heading: BOARDS AND COMMISSIONS REFORM ACT OF 2013 aka "New Columbia Statehood Initiative and Omnibus Boards and Commissions Reform Amendment Act of 2014"

history.narrative: Law 20-271, the “New Columbia Statehood Initiative and Omnibus Boards and Commissions Reform Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-71. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 7, 2014, and October 28, 2014, respectively. Deemed approved without the signature of the Mayor on January 29, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-615 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-271 became effective May 2, 2015.
